"\\brutal\\brutal\\brutal.lua",r) if check_path then io.close(check_path) plugin_path = GetInfo(60) .. "\\brutal\\brutal\\?.lua" brutal_path = GetInfo(60) .. "\\brutal-master\\brutal-master\\brutal\\?.lua" brutal_path = GetInfo(60) .. "\\brutal-master\\brutal-master\\brutal\\" end package.path = package.path .. ";" .. plugin_path
